meanings.sent1: She wiped the table cleanlier than before.
meanings.sent2: He always washes his hands cleanlier after playing outside.
meanings.sent3: The cat groomed itself cleanlier than a royal prince.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone cleanlier after the rain, brightening the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The fresh laundry smelled cleanlier than a field of flowers.

meanings.sent1: She organized her room more cleanlier than her sister.

meanings.sent4: The river flowed more cleanlier after the pollution was cleaned up.
meanings.sent5: The air felt more cleanlier after the storm had passed.

meanings.sent1: The cleanlier room was a joy to walk into.
